Jasmine was a fragrant flowering plant that grew in shrubs and vines and often used in perfumes and aromatics.
A jasmine shrub flowered abundantly. Each small white flower had four or five long petals. Jasmine plan flowers had gentle blue hue in the spring.
Auroras Whole Realms Catalogue sold jasmine oil (3 gp per ), Jasmine Night perfume (1 gp per vial), and jasmine-scented water (35 sp per ))
Inhabitants of Myth Drannor used jasmine plants to create delicate and alluring perfumes. One such inhabitant, Elena radiated the aroma of jasmine long after death while haunting the ruins of the city.
Jasmine dust was an aromatic perfume-like powder imported from Kara-Tur.
Circa 1367 DR, the Palace of the Enlightened Throne in Zakhara was purchasing copious amounts of jasmine of the Grand Caliphs Private BathsÂ after he started fancying the flowers aroma.
Circa 1367 DR, the Jasmine Dream inn was located in the city of Dihliz, owned by a gnome named Ahmad. The inn was poshly decorated and abundantly perfumed with fresh jasmine flowers.
